experience: You and Keith both know Dustin Faultner, SPHR (L.I.O.N.), Evan Elbert, and 50 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017

Do you want to help plan the future at Charles Schwab?  We are searching for a Senior Manager, Retail Strategy in San Francisco. If you have a passion for understanding client needs, have an MBA, strong business consulting experience and you enjoy creating solutions for the business, than click below to learn more. #4CSHM

Do you have multiple years of compliance experience in the mutual fund and/or investment management/advisory industry and have strong project management skills? If so, this is the perfect role for you. #4CSHM #Ownyourtomorrow

Are you familiar with Salesforce and have 3 or more years of experience in lead management functions and strategy? We are hiring a Lead Management Specialist in Austin, TX to focus on the processes and business support around lead capture, scoring, and routing for all leads generated with Schwab. This is an excellent opportunity to grow within the marketing team! Click the link to read more.  #4CSHM #ownyourtomorrow
Calling all Digital Analytics gurus…. We have a great opportunity in our new Westlake facility to showcase your talent.  #4CSHM

Love consulting, but need work life balance? Charles Schwab is searching for a Senior Manager, Client Development Strategy role in our Lone Tree, CO location. If you have passion for understanding client needs, love Strategy, have an MBA, strong business consulting experience, then click below. We offer work life balance, and a well-respected consulting environment. #4CSHM

Support Charles Schwab Private Client groups hiring demands and partnering with hiring managers to effectively source and hire the best talent in the market.Additionally, responsible for hiring across Schwab International locations in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and Australia.
Manager, Metrics & Reporting for Global HR
Program Manager, Operations Risk, Global Credit
Manager, Talent Acquisition - PayPal Global Operations

	Responsible for all recruiting efforts of 5 person TA Team in Chandler, 2 Recruiter’s in Maryland with a Team Req load varying between 30 – 200/month. Also responsible for the TA activities in Sao Paulo, Brazil	Responsible for all recruiting related to Customer Service, Fraud, Compliance, Telesales, Underwriting, Collections, Merchant Services, (exempt & non-exempt) for all PayPal BU’s and Bill Me Later BU’s	Work directly with Site Leadership Team (Managers, Sr. Managers and Directors) in communicating TA hiring plan and provide status updates	Attend all Site Leadership and BU Leadership meetings to discuss hiring in Chandler and Maryland	Global TA representative for all Workforce Planning and Capacity Planning meetings for the hiring of 1,300+ individuals in Chandler	Leading projects to create Recruiting efficiencies: “Day in the Life” video, Assessment Simulation, enhanced Interview Guides, Regression Analysis for BU’s	Personally responsible for carrying a  Requisition load
Sr. Recruiter for PayPal, an ebay company

Along with an awesome team of Recruiters, responsible for high-volume recruiting for Customer Service, Collections and exempt level positions for PayPal's Chandler, AZ Operations Center.  - Was sent to Shanghai, China for 4 weeks, on behalf of PayPal’s Global TA Team to assist Shanghai TA Team with best practices, processes and procedures. Made recommendations towards a University Recruiting Program and an Alumni Program - Was Project Manager of 5 month project to create a “Day In The Life” Recruiting video for external applicants to view. Successfully completed and implemented May 2012. Currently working with Europe and Asia to create there versions. - Goal is to hire 2,200 people by end of 2012 - Involved with creating metrics/spreadsheets to track Recruiter performance and class fill rates and effectiveness - Recruited for positions globally - Accounting position in Omaha, NE, Sr. Operations position in San Jose, CA, Marketing Manager in Brazil, Customer Service positions in Malaysia, to name a few - Continue to build and maintain internal relationships with hiring managers in Chandler and other PayPal/eBay locations around the globe. - Foster a Team environment in TA where we can effectively and efficiently hit all goals put in front of us to get the Business the talent they need to satisfy our customers

recommendations: February 16, 2014, Keith was senior to Brad but didn’t manage directly

Not only is Keith a successful and accomplished businessman, he is a strong, dedicated manager. I remember many times when Keith would encourage me or give me leadership or career tips. Keith initially interviewed me and later trained me to interview and hire others.  I count it a privilege to constantly work so closely with a man of such high caliber. Such a willingness to invest in others and dedication to growing future leaders is the mark of a true leader and for this I would recommend Keith without hesitation.

May 1, 2012, Keith worked with Sumer in different groups

Sumer & I worked at RHI together. Although she supported a different Group within RHI, I had the pleasure of interacting with her, on various occassions, when business/clients required me too. She was always, honest, sincere, thoughtful, and considerate of not only her external clients, but internal business partners as well. Sumer remained calm when faced with challenging situations and always stayed late or worked longer hours to get the job done and satisfy the client. She displayed business acumen and professionalism well beyond her years. She made it very easy to work with her and I think she would be an asset to any HR/Recruiting Team.

summary: Excited to be a part of the Charles Schwab family! My primary responsibilities are supporting Schwab Private Client, in staffing for a variety of roles including Portfolio Consultants, Financial Planners, High Net Worth & Estate Specialists and Investment Consultants. Most roles require licensing (i.e. Series 7 & 66) as well as other professional designations (i.e. CFP, CFA).I support AZ, CO, IN and FL locations. Please feel free to contact me if you or anyone you know has interest in these areas. Email: keith.vogel@schwab.comTo learn more about how Charles Schwab has been recognized as a top employer, please visit www.aboutschwab.com/careers/life_at_schwab/great_workplace	To learn more about Life@Schwab and our current openings, please visit aboutschwab.com/careers
